greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of (Sum_{n=-inf..inf} x^(n^2))^(-3).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000 (terms 0..4000 from Robert Israel)
Vaclav Kotesovec, A method of finding the asymptotics of q-series based on the convolution of generating functions, arXiv:1509.08708 [math.CO], Sep 30 2015, p. 8.
formula: a(n) ~ (-1)^n * 3*exp(Pi*sqrt(3*n)) / (64*n^(3/2)) * (1 - sqrt(3)/(Pi*sqrt(n))). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 18 2015, extended Jan 16 2017
mathematica: nmax = 30; CoefficientList[Series[Product[((1 + (-x)^k)/(1 - (-x)^k))^3, {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 18 2015 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
